price: 91. Sidaas weeyee! Waxaana ku koobnay ogaansho waxa uu heystay.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
